Add On Load.description: Adds a function to be called on the form OnLoad event.

Get Form Type.description: Gets the form type for the record.

Get View Port Height.description: Gets the height of the viewport in pixels.

Get View Port Width.description: Gets the width of the viewport in pixels.

Refresh Ribbon.description: Causes the ribbon to re-evaluate data that controls what is displayed in it.

Remove On Load.description: Removes a function from the form OnLoad event.

Set Form Entity Name.description: Sets the name of the entity to be displayed on the form.

Form Selector Get Item.description: Returns reference to the form corresponding to the passed arguments

Form Selecter Get Current Item.description: Returns a reference to the form currently being shown. When only one form is available this method will return null.

Process Get Display State.description: Retrieves the display state for the business process control.

Process Get Visible.description: Returns a value indicating whether the business process control is visible.

Process Reflow.description: Reflows the UI of the business process control.

Process Set Display State.description: Sets the display state of the business process control.

Process Set Visible.description: Shows or hides the business process control.
